txt.en: You delivered a small chunk of ore
You dropped the ore
Hard Tack Event: Small Ore Delivery
Deliver the small ore to a mine cart
Collect one more small chunk of harvested ever-burning ore and deliver it to an ore cart inside of the event space for Hard Tack of Thorin's Hall.

'Freeing the ever-burning ore from nearby veins is only half the effort needed. Ever-burning ore is not only volatile but also heavy.

'You can carry more of the small chunks of ever-burning ore, but they burn more quickly. They will also weigh you down.

'Collect enough of the small ore and deliver it to an ore-cart in Ukhbab-gairu.'
A sluggard miner tripped you up
